Package org.keycloak.constants

Class OID4VCIConstants

java.lang.Object
org.keycloak.constants.OID4VCIConstants
public final class OID4VCIConstants extends Object
Keycloak specific constants related to OID4VC and related functionality. Useful for example for internal constants (EG. name of Keycloak realm attributes). For protocol constants defined in the specification, see OID4VCConstants
Author:
